info.author: Dan Trickey
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
# CircleCI Branch Detector

[![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/j5api/circleci_branch.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/j5api/circleci_branch)

Script to find the parent branch of the pull request that we are in. For use in CircleCI.

```
Usage: circleci-branch [OPTIONS]

  Get the parent branch of a GitHub pull request.

  This is designed for use in CircleCI, using auto-merges to behave
  similarly to Merge Trains in GitLab.

Options:
  --pull_request_url TEXT
  --github_token TEXT
  --help                   Show this message and exit.
```

## Installation

The module is published on PyPI.

`pip install circleci_branch`

## Contributions

This project is released under the MIT Licence. For more information, please see LICENSE.

The CONTRIBUTORS file can be generated by executing CONTRIBUTORS.gen. This generated file contains a list of people who have contributed to CircleCI Branch Detector.
